CreateKeySpace: CREATE KEYSPACE IF NOT EXISTS [keyspace] WITH REPLICATION = {'class' : 'SimpleStrategy', 'replication_factor' : 3};
CreateTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS contoso.production (FnOTableName text, PartitionTime BigInt, Operation tinyint, RecId bigint, UniqueId UUID, Document text, PRIMARY KEY ((FnOTableName, PartitionTime), Operation, RecId, UniqueId));
TestInsert: INSERT INTO [keyspace].[environment] (FnOTableName, PartitionTime, Operation, RecId, UniqueId, Document) VALUES ('SomeTable', toUnixTimestamp(now()), 0, 1, UUID(), 'Some JSON will be here');
